meanings.definition: A tripeptide molecule composed of three amino acids: glutamic acid, cysteine, and glycine, that acts as an antioxidant in the body.
meanings.sent1: Glutathione helps protect our cells from damage caused by free radicals.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes recommend supplements to increase the levels of glutathione in the body.
meanings.sent3: When the body runs out of glutathione, it's like a superhero losing their shield.
meanings.sent4: The role of glutathione in the body is like a shield that defends against harmful substances.
meanings.sent5: Imagine glutathione as a tiny shield inside each cell, fighting off the bad guys.
